org.openwms.common.units

Class Weight

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openwms.common.units.Weight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Weight>, org.openwms.core.values.Measurable<BigDecimal,Weight,WeightUnit>, org.openwms.core.values.UnitType

    public class Weight
extends Object
implements org.openwms.core.values.Measurable<BigDecimal,Weight,WeightUnit>, org.openwms.core.values.UnitType, Serializable
    A Weight represents a real world weight, that comes with an Unit and a value.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
